title: Orchestrate batch runs on GCP with retries and timeouts
scope: Implement GCP Batch as the MVP execution primitive for batch jobs (Cloud Run Jobs / Vertex custom jobs are out of scope for this intent).
Add retry policy and hard timeouts to avoid runaway cost.
Ensure logs and run summaries are discoverable for portal/ops.
acceptance: A documented command or script submits a job spec to GCP and runs the worker container.
Timeouts and retries are configured and tested on a failing job.
Run outputs are written to status/audit evidence for at least one sample run.

deliverables.title: GCP job submission script and docs
acceptance: Job submission script validates job spec and submits a run.
Docs explain required GCP resources and recommended settings.

subtasks.title: Implement job submission script and basic retry/timeout config.
done_when: gcp_submit_job.mjs exists and submits a job using the runner image.
Timeout and retry settings are configurable per mode.
